easing

You seriously expect me to write out cubic bezier functions in this $6,800 suit? Come on! Roots has all the most common easing functions right here for you, in englishâ„¢! You can use these anywhere, but they are probably most useful in a transition, like this for example: transition: all .25s ease-in-sine. It's almost like this was actually a part of css like it should be!
